members.ref_title: The Life Cycle of a Butterfly
members.entity_description: Reproductive partner that butterflies seek during the adult stage.
members.resolution_context: Throughout their adult stage, butterflies focus on finding a mate and reproducing to continue the life cycle.
members.resolution_rationale: Denotes the reproductive partner (a role) and is conceptually separate from life stages and biological processes.

resolution_rationale: Denotes the role of a reproductive partner (mate), conceptually distinct from life cycle stages and processes.

entity_description: Process by which butterflies produce offspring and continue the species’ life cycle.
resolution_context: Throughout their adult stage, butterflies focus on finding a mate and reproducing to continue the life cycle.

members.ref_title: The Life Cycle of a Butterfly
members.entity_description: Process by which butterflies produce offspring and continue the species’ life cycle.
members.resolution_context: Throughout their adult stage, butterflies focus on finding a mate and reproducing to continue the life cycle.
members.resolution_rationale: Represents the biological process of reproduction, distinct from both the partner (mate) and the broader life cycle.

resolution_rationale: Represents the biological process of reproducing, distinct from both the mate role and the life cycle stage entities.

entity_description: Initial flight event of the butterfly once its wings are fully developed.
resolution_context: Once its wings are fully developed, the butterfly is ready to take flight for the first time.

members.ref_title: The Life Cycle of a Butterfly
members.text_span: take flight for the first time
members.entity_description: Initial flight event of the butterfly once its wings are fully developed.
members.resolution_context: Once its wings are fully developed, the butterfly is ready to take flight for the first time.
members.resolution_rationale: This is an event (the butterfly's initial flight), conceptually different from anatomical structures or substances, so it should remain separate.

resolution_rationale: Describes a behavioral event (first flight), which is not redundant with any anatomical or life-stage entities.

entity_description: Broad system of ecosystems and living processes of which butterfly life cycles are a part.
resolution_context: By understanding and appreciating the life cycle of butterflies, we gain a deeper appreciation for the intricate connections and processes that make up the natural world.

members.ref_title: The Life Cycle of a Butterfly
members.entity_description: Broad system of ecosystems and living processes of which butterfly life cycles are a part.
members.resolution_context: By understanding and appreciating the life cycle of butterflies, we gain a deeper appreciation for the intricate connections and processes that make up the natural world.
members.resolution_rationale: Denotes the broad, overarching concept of the natural world and its interconnected processes, which is semantically wider than a single ecosystem and should remain separate.

resolution_rationale: The 'natural world' is a broader concept than a single ecosystem and is described at a higher level; should remain distinct.

entity_description: The complete developmental journey the butterfly undergoes before reaching its adult stage.
resolution_context: Next time you see a butterfly fluttering by, take a moment to marvel at the incredible journey it has taken to reach that moment of beauty and grace.

members.ref_title: The Life Cycle of a Butterfly
members.text_span: the incredible journey it has taken
members.entity_description: The complete developmental journey the butterfly undergoes before reaching its adult stage.
members.resolution_context: Next time you see a butterfly fluttering by, take a moment to marvel at the incredible journey it has taken to reach that moment of beauty and grace.
members.resolution_rationale: This refers to the overall developmental process or journey of the butterfly, not to the organism itself.

resolution_rationale: Refers to the developmental process of a butterfly, distinct from the aesthetic/experiential state described by the other entity.

entity_description: The experienced state when observing an adult butterfly displaying beauty and graceful movement.
resolution_context: Next time you see a butterfly fluttering by, take a moment to marvel at the incredible journey it has taken to reach that moment of beauty and grace.

members.ref_title: The Life Cycle of a Butterfly
members.text_span: that moment of beauty and grace
members.entity_description: The experienced state when observing an adult butterfly displaying beauty and graceful movement.
members.resolution_context: Next time you see a butterfly fluttering by, take a moment to marvel at the incredible journey it has taken to reach that moment of beauty and grace.
members.resolution_rationale: This denotes an experiential or descriptive state ('moment of beauty and grace'), distinct from the organism or its life cycle.

resolution_rationale: Represents the aesthetic and experiential state of observing a butterfly, not the biological life cycle, so it should remain separate.
